sentences.sContent: It is a painful experience having the boil lanced.
sentences.sCn: 将疖子切开是个痛苦的经历。

phrases.pCn: 自由作家，自由撰搞人；自由骑士

words.tran: [外科] 小刀，柳叶刀；尖顶窗；小枪
（19世纪法国的）长矛轻骑兵；枪骑兵；一种四人组的舞

trans.tranOther: a long thin pointed weapon that was used in the past by soldiers riding on horses

trans.tranCn: 以长矛攻击；用柳叶刀割开；冲进
trans.tranOther: If a boil on someone's body is lanced, a small cut is made in it so that the liquid inside comes out
